title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: At Apple, we believe in the power of technology to enrich people's lives. Everything we build is designed to empower people, including our advertising platform...
description: The Finance & Billing team is the backbone of Apple’s Ad Platform Revenue & Payout function for our partners. As a technical lead, you will design and develop a scalable back-end system that will handle Invoicing, payments, payouts, taxes and deliver key business data to our cross-functional stakeholders...
key_qualifications: 10+ years of industry software engineering experience (full stack and backend), Exceptional computer science fundamentals (system's design, OO, data structures and algorithms), Extensive software development experience in one or more general purpose programming languages (Java)...
education_experience: Bachelor's in Computer Science or equivalent is required; Master's or PhD preferred
